project.description: Build a new Eucalyptus Cloud from Packages.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cluster
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of machine you would like to install the CC and SC.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: frontend
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of machine you would like to install the node controller on

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: password
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Leave blank if you've uploaded your ssh keys

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: configuration
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description:
Configuration of the Eucalyptus deployment.
Full list of attributes can be found here: https://github.com/viglesiasce/eucalyptus-cookbook/blob/master/attributes/default.rb

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [ $password ];then knife bootstrap $frontend -E $environment --no-host-key-verify -r "role[node]" -j "`cat config.json`" -P $password knife bootstrap $cluster -E $environment --no-host-key-verify -r "recipe[eucalyptus::register-nodes]" -j "`cat config.json`" -P $password else knife bootstrap $frontend -E $environment --no-host-key-verify -r "role[node]" -j "`cat config.json`" knife bootstrap $cluster -E $environment --no-host-key-verify -r "recipe[eucalyptus::register-nodes]" -j "`cat config.json`" fi
